Quick search

ConversationTab module¶

class ConversationTab.ConversationTab(master, myId)[source]¶

Bases: tkinter.Frame

This class represents a “tab” in the notebook. It contains the GUI elements used to display output to and take input from the user. As well as the methods that operate on those elements. Inherits from tk.Frame

create_widgets()[source]¶

This method initializes the GUI elements of the tab, such as the “Send” button, the new text entry line, and the text display widget.

send_message(event)[source]¶

This method reads the text present in the entry box and sends it by calling the send_text method of the MainWindow class.

Parameters:event – The event that caused this method to be called.
text_received(text)[source]¶

This method adds the given text to the text display area of the tab. Called by the text_received method of the MainWindow class.

Parameters:text (str) – The text to be added to the display area.
